author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Spanish and Portuguese
description: GameChanger钱包专注于发展中国家的用户，但缺乏i18n。我们希望打破这一障碍，特别是拉丁美洲的用户。

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal addresses the challenge in the sense that it contributes to open-up the Cardano ecosystem to communities outside the English speaking world, specifically the Spanish and Portuguese speaking communities in Latin America. Nevertheless, the proposal falls short because, as it can be verified in the section "Use cases and costumers", in essence, the goal of the proposal is to: "Translate all the GameChanger wallet interface and components". That is, the goal of the proposal is simply to translate ONE wallet.
The value of the proposal for the Cardano Community can be increased by making the translations available to other wallets, preferably in a standard digital format which can be easily ported to other projects.
f6_assessments.q1: Yes, the proponents provide evidence that they have completed a project of software development (the wallet). This suggests that they can see the project through and that they have the access and the control to provide all necessary information to produce the translations and to incorporate them into the final project. The evidence provided suggests that the proponents can supervise the execution and implementation of the translations.
f6_assessments.q2: Yes, the project is sufficiently simple and adequately budgeted that it seems feasible to supervise its execution and monitor its success.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is very simple and well written: Translate the Gamechanger wallet into Spanish and Portugese. In this respect it perfectly meets the challenge.
Looking at the wallet it looks to be well developed with some good features and looks like its here to stay. The choice for the voter is now whether to support further development and expansion of this wallet, in my personal opinion looking at the team and work done on gamechanger, this proposal is good value for money.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan, resource and deliverables of this proposal are very well set put and simple to assess. Having 20+year development and technical PM experience I believe this proposal is very likely to succeed.
f6_assessments.q2: The metrics described are focussed on the right areas, ie onboarded LATAM users. I would like to have seen some more specific targets set by the proposer in terms of measuring interest and onboarding of users onto gamechanger. This point does not distract from the over positive assessment provided for this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Gamechanger seems to beb a great wallet as presented by the Proposers. Have it in various languages increase accessibility to different people, what's one this challenge objectives.
f6_assessments.q1:
The Gamechanger has proven that it works well and developers continue to improve its performances. Having it in multiple languages will allow people to adopt it, and increase users and lovers.
Beyond the LATAM countries, I see other countries in Africa where Spanish or Portuguese is spoken in which people would benefit from that language implementation. In some or most of those countries too, the infrastructures don't allow easy access to technology or to phones with big data capacity.
The team of proposers is formed by people with experience in the Hosting & Cloud industry; in systems integration and DevOps and who have already developed this tool. It's not a project starting from scratch, but an addition to what was already released. This increase the chances of success for this proposal.
My question or thought would be to know what are the other languages that the team is targeting for the  next phase. Expressing this clearly will allow assessor to understand where will the Gamechanger reach next.
f6_assessments.q2:
Wouldn't be necessary to the community to follow the progress of this great proposal? I think the answer would be yes, but it's not explicitly mentioned in the proposal.
I may be wrong  but I think 3 months may not be enough to full implement this project and have it properly running, and that would be one the risks I would see to not be in conformity with the allocated time for delivery of the service.
But you as a team you know better your internal resources that made you to set the 3 months as project duration.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposition addresses a clear problem and relates in a coherent way to the needs of the challenge. In the sense that the solution is to allow any LATAM user to be able to embark and use their wallet with ease and using their mother tongue (Spanish or Portuguese). So the positive impact of their solution is clear and even plans to extend over the long term. This impact is also present in the KPIs which also coincide with those of the challenge. On the other hand, with a view to expanding this proposal has the potential to address future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: It is easy to identify the members of this team as well as their skills. Their site and a video are provided, as well as access to the links of their profils. The team members seem to be very active in the community and their explanation of their current core features is richly precise and informative. The budget is clear and well detailed, it seems very realistic and reasonable. The plan describes the necessary resources with associated temporality indices, as well as technical explanations.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap is precise, and the KPIs provide appreciable qualitative clues, and their objective of success appears consistent. Their desire for transparency and communication with the community is felt in the overallity of this proposal and is accentuated by their project to: contribute to the overall Catalyst experience and created Project Catapult for all the not-funded proposals and helping on Catalyst Community Tools On-Chain.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal effectively addresses the challenge since it creates an accessible app with well-designed way to attract users. The Gamechanger is also adopt well Cardano blockchain platform.
f6_assessments.q1: Currently, the project team has available resources (implementing the project from the previous Fund), so it is highly likely that the team will develop successfully when taking advantage of that resource. The proposal also includes detail plan with the roadmap. The expected fund is reasonable and well-explained.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes clear roadmap, which make it easy to track their progress. However their KPIs is lack of quantity number for each goal, which will help the project's success become more measureable. For example, after 3 months a Latam users growth into how many users?

f6_assessments.q0:
This recommendation integrates commonly used i18n and translations in spanish and portuguese for their main product, GameChanger Wallet. Despite having an advanced rich set of features, some users will not be able to benefit from the whole user experience until everything is properly translated and users can use our product with their native language.
I think this proposal will appeal to a large number of people from emerging countries, especially those who are using Spanish and Portuguese languages.
f6_assessments.q1:
The plan is presented in a truly optimal way, there is a good chance that this proposal can be successfully implemented in the manner described by the proponents. The roadmap is well estimated in my opinion, the terms seem concrete. A complete profile of the people involved is provided, they are knowledgeable and experienced, making project implementation much easier.
However, how to attract people to GameChanger Wallet? (marketing, communication,...) this has not been described. It is necessary to add a few criteria to evaluate success such as: number of visits, number of accounts created, ...
In essence, however, the plan describes the resources needed to implement the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
I have read the proposal, visited the website, watched the video provided, I think the information provided is enough to judge the success of the project. The features of GameChanger are described very specifically and in detail. This project will bring back great value, ensure any user in LATAM emerging countries can onboard and use the wallet with total ease and using their native language.
In addition, to increase the persuasion, it is necessary to add some content, which I mentioned in the previous section (marketing, success evaluation criteria,...). It is also necessary to identify difficulties and challenges and how to solve those difficulties and challenges.

solution: 为我们的主要产品GameChanger Wallet整合常用的西班牙语和葡萄牙语的i18n和翻译。
experience: 我们制作了GameChanger，一个已发布的长期产品，高度人性化和游戏化的钱包，致力于为新人、学生和建设者服务。
